posts.post_content: Send me a list of all of your t205s! I just started collecting the set so I need alot of cards!
Bump. Just got paid and looking to buy a lot. Back must be able to read
Anyone have a lot for me??

I have the following T205 cards I am trading or selling for T205 cards I need.

send me an email if interested.

Folks, do not waste your time here.  Adam is only wanting to get cards at stolen prices.  He's paying $25 for graded VGEX cards.  That it and very annoying about it as well. Just a disclaimer here. 
Cory Weiser

[quote name="AddieJoss" post=1305641]Folks, do not waste your time here.  Adam is only wanting to get cards at stolen prices.  He's paying $25 for graded VGEX cards.  That it and very annoying about it as well. Just a disclaimer here. 
Cory Weiser[/QUOTE]

I've actually bought about 45 cards and have spent over $1000. No need to bad mouth me and tell people that.  I'm Trying to collect the set and that was completely uncalled for. I'm sorry me and you didn't make a deal but I make deals with other people. Go waste your time somewhere else I'm trying to collect a set here.
Plus i told you i meant to make the deal 300 not 200 it was a MISTAKE. i only offered you $50 less then what you asked so how about you talk it over before you start tattle tailing.

2 dozen messages back and forth and your offers are always silly.  8 graded cards for in VGEX for $200?  Come on, it appears there is no intention of making a deal, but wasted a lot of time.  Just my perspective on it.
I said i made a mistake i put a 200 instead of a 300. 200 was not my offer just a poor mistake on my part
